trans-unit.source: Converts instances of the <xref:System.String> type to and from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Converte istanze del <xref:System.String>digitare da e verso <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> istanze.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se una classe può essere convertita da un tipo specifico a un'istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter>supporta la conversione da e verso il <xref:System.String>tipo.</xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter>

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: Descrive le informazioni di contesto di un tipo.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di origine che viene valutata per la conversione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert from the specified type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il convertitore può convertire dal tipo specificato in un'istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> can be converted to a different type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un'istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref> può essere convertito in un tipo diverso.

trans-unit.source: Conversion is possible only if `context` is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type, and `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: La conversione è possibile solo se `context` è un <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>, tipo e `destinationType` è un <xref:System.String>tipo.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property for `context` cannot be null or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, which identifies `context` as an anonymous <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>proprietà `context` non può essere null o uguale a <xref:System.String.Empty>, che identifica `context` come un anonimo <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> to the specified type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
